name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Get the most out of your adventure with the Deluxe Edition, which includes a digital adventure guide and in-game content such as the Prosperity Bird amulet and the Immortal outfit for Sargon.

Pre-purchase to get an exclusive in-game Warrior Within outfit!
